data.name: 廃村巡り | Haisonmeguri
data.detailed_description:
This game is a first-person J-horror game.
The setting of this game is created in the image of an abandoned village in Japan.

GAME SYSTEM

This game is a "walking simulator".

The game screen is generally darkened to create a frightening atmosphere.
It is recommended to darken the room and play with headphones.

This game does not support English.
data.about_the_game:
This game is a first-person J-horror game.
The setting of this game is created in the image of an abandoned village in Japan.

GAME SYSTEM

This game does not support English.
data.short_description: "廃村巡り | Haisonmeguri " is a J-horror walking simulator game based on a terrifying experience involving an abandoned village.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10,11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6th Gen
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: When "Low" is selected for "Quality". Wear headphones and play in the dark.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10,11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 9th gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Wear headphones and play in the dark.
